job_tasks.phrase: align technical solutions with strategic goals
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to connect technical work with business objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: Help high-value users to find and start their journey with HubSpot
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on user acquisition and business growth, which is a business objective.

job_tasks.phrase: Envision, build and analyze new features and tools, each contributing to company growth and revenue
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly links feature development to company growth and revenue, demonstrating a business understanding requirement.

job_tasks.phrase: get exposed to how HubSpot works as a business
job_tasks.justification: Directly states the need to understand the business operations.

job_tasks.phrase: not only get excited about big, technical challenges but also about being very close to the business and our go-to-market strategies
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the importance of understanding business strategy and go-to-market plans.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement experiments that give us valuable insights into user behavior and how to improve their experience
job_tasks.justification: Implies data collection and analysis for insights, which is a precursor to data engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: You have or are interested in developing data analysis skills. You're not afraid to dive into Amplitude, Looker, Excel, or other data analysis tools and collaborate with our ops and analytics teams
job_tasks.justification: This points to data handling and analysis, which are part of data engineering and analysis.

job_tasks.phrase: You have an interest in generative AI and how it can be applied to improving user experience
job_tasks.justification: Indicates an interest in applying generative AI techniques, which falls under modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Support Acquisition, Distribution and Affiliations initiatives, building APIs and tools that will help Signup, Integrations and Partnerships
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions building APIs and tools, which are core software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Write and ship production code that has meaningful user and business impact
job_tasks.justification: This is a fundamental software development task – writing and deploying code.

job_tasks.phrase: work full stack, across a broad set of technologies
job_tasks.justification: Describes a broad scope of software development work, including front-end and back-end.

job_tasks.phrase: you are looking to be more hands-on
job_tasks.justification: Emphasizes the practical, hands-on nature of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: You are interested in becoming a master of the experimentation process and A/B tests
job_tasks.justification: Experimentation and A/B testing are key components of iterative development and product improvement, often managed within an MLOps or product operations context.

soft_skills.phrase: Work with a small cross-functional team of engineers, PMs, designers, content designers, and researchers
Collaborate with HubSpotters all over the company, whether in engineering, product, design, research, marketing, sales, etc
You have an interest in generative AI
You have or are interested in developing data analysis skills
You are interested in becoming a master of the experimentation process and A/B tests
helping set the direction of the group

classification.rationale: While the role expresses an interest in generative AI, the core responsibilities and emphasized skills revolve around traditional software development, API building, and data analysis for business growth. There's no explicit mention of developing or fine-tuning generative models themselves, nor building complex GenAI agents, which are hallmarks of a GenAI Engineer.
